In this version, we fixed the issue of black out during editing. Also, you will be able to speed up/rewind/reverse each video clip in the editing session. Hope you enjoy VCUS! If you have any feedback, please feel free to DM us via Instagram @vcusapp.

In this version, we fixed the issue of black out during editing. Also, you will be able to speed up/rewind/reverse each video clip in the editing session. Hope you enjoy VCUS! If you have any feedback, please feel free to DM us via Instagram @vcusapp.

Dear User,
We've added a new feature in this version that lets you use music from iTunes. Now you can use your own music to make more creative and personalized videos. We've also optimized our user feedback system, so we can solve your problems more efficiently.

If you have any feedback or suggestions, please feel free to contact us at support@vcusapp.com. We are trying best to provide a better VCUS for you.

Dear User,

Dear users, we've made the following updates in this version:
1. Editing features under Music have been updated. Now you can enjoy the fun of stickers and text while applying slo-mo effects to your videos.
2. To make it easier for you to upload your videos to different platforms, we have added a more diverse selection of frames in this version.
3. We’ve enriched the Text function by adding more personalized settings.

If you have any feedback or suggestions, please feel free to contact us at support@vcusapp.com. We are trying best to provide a better VCUS for you.

In the newest version of VCUS, we have added many new features, such as dynamic Story templates, scheduled posts, highlight cover creation, and portrait beautification and makeup effects. We also upgraded the video editing experience and added text stickers, filters, transitions, and other features to make VCUS easier to use.

If you have any feedback or suggestions, please feel free to contact us at support@vcusapp.com. We are trying best to provide a better VCUS for you.

Dear User, 
we have updated our editing tools in this version. 1. The Eraser function has been added to help you remove unwanted content in photos. 2.The portrait beautification function has been upgraded by adding a "Slim Face" feature. 3.The transition effect for templates is back, which will make your stories more interesting. We are continually working to provide a better experience to help you create brilliant IG Stories.

If you have any feedback or suggestions, please feel free to contact us at support@vcusapp.com. We are trying best to provide a better VCUS for you.

1. With our newly added [Brand Kit], you can add your brand's icons, fonts and colors.
2. An old feature is back: Access your music from your iTunes Music Library and add them to your videos.
3. [Light] and [Dark] display modes have been added to provide you with day and night viewing experiences.

If you have any feedback or suggestions, please feel free to contact us at support@vcusapp.com. We are trying best to provide a better VCUS for you.
